Posts.Content: Feb 23, 2013 01:39PM - edited Feb 23, 2013 01:42PM by Hrlady53 Can anyone tell me if they have used a third party to help them with SSDI? I have been diagnosed with Stage 4.  If I am reading correctly, I could have completed the forms myself and not have to pay a third party.  I wish that I had known this earlier before selecting a third party. Thanks, Linda
Posts.Title: SSDI with stage 4 cancer tclawmen Hrlady53

Posts.Content: Feb 26, 2013 02:37PM Hrlady53 wrote: Hi Anacortes Girl, I am using Allsup.  They charge 25% if they win.  I was first diagnosed in 10/11.  They told me that my five month waiting would be in May 12.  They have just sent my info over to the DDS office on 2-12-13.  So I guess that I will just have to wait and see what happens. Thanks
